description:
All Ash wanted was to get some "alone time" with his new girl Linda . . . but an isolated cabin in the woods, harboring ancient secrets and angry demons, ruined any chance Ash had at "getting lucky." With Linda infected and crazed, Ash and Scotty bury what's left of Shelly before Scotty heads out into the woods to find help.

Well, he certainly finds something out there. Ash has his hands full trying to keep Linda off of him-which would be a good thing, had Linda not been completely possessed by murderous deadite rage! Ash struggles to save his friends and his sanity, as those fallen to the destructive deadites move in for the final kill! Relive the original thrilling Evil Dead experience in the only officially authorized EXPANSION of Sam Raimi's classic film, featuring gorgeous-and-gory painted interiors by John Bolton (Army of Darkness, Harlequin Valentine) and some of the best new Ash quips ever-as penned by legendary scribe Mark Verheiden!
name: Book 3 of 4

description:
Overview
First issue of a new on-going series! The Bwahaha isn't just back, now it won't go away! Milo's a slacker in this world, but the next universe over he's champion of justice Captain Valor. Now that Valor's come to his world, Milo's learning that he's his own worst enemy. Milo's gone for Valor's girlfriend, the evil Calignous, while Valor's going for Milo's girlfriend Steffie. Can you cheat on your girlfriend with... a parallel universe version of your own girlfriend?
name: It Gets Worse!

description:
Captain Valor and Milo go to therapy to work out there problems.

Overview

So what do you do when you can't seem to get along with your parallel world superhero alternate self? You both go to therapy! Milo and Captain Valor decide to sit down and work it out, and the results are… well, let's just say that the session's going to be really expensive! More best-selling, critically-acclaimed Bwah-ha-ha hilarity from the premiere writing team in comics!
name: The Doctor Will See You Now

description:
Comics superstar Bernard Chang joins Gail Simone for a 2-part story that will take Wonder Woman to the furthest reaches of the galaxy, but not before the vicious alien race the Khund begin an assault on Earth! But before the invasion can begin, the relationship of Wonder Woman and Nemesis takes a defining turn.

Wonder Woman visits Tom Tressor/Nemesis in the hospital after the whole incident involving the poison. She gives him a nectarine pit and a ribbon with thorns on it. She then is bombarded by many fans when one of the ladies that run the front desk pulls out her out and Diana makes her way outside. And spots an invasion. The Khunds invade and he calls out a scroll which declares their invasion. She asks if this is an invasion against her country or her planet, and the Khund reading out the scroll says it's just against her. Wonder Woman then fights them, and defeats them by grabbing one of their guns off the tank, and shooting down the invasion ship. The Khund then tells his army to stop, and Diana then asks why they wanted to kill her. The Khund explains that it is a tribute, to honor her.

The last warrior she was holding up admits to Wonder Woman that she is her biggest fan. The Khund introduces her as his daughter, called Kho. The Khund, who has the daughter named Kho introduces himself as Karhi. They take her to their home planet and Karhi explains that the Ichor is killing their civilisation and they cannot stop it. Wonder Woman asks why they have chosen her, then Etta comes out.

Diana and Etta then go to investigate the Ichor and find themselves standing in green goo. Diana tells Etta that "Ichor" is the name of a god, and it worries her that this name has anything to do with the attacking of the Khunds. The both of them find a ship, when Diana goes to investigate herself. She gets punched by a Green Lantern, who tells them that he is protecting the Khunds! The issue finishes with Etta going, "Woo-@&#%ing-woo."
name: Expatriate, Part 1: That Wears the Crown

description:
Overview

On an Earth ravaged almost a half-century ago by a brutal storm of meteors, the first mission of the New Exiles has turned into a madcap exercise in survival against increasingly deadly adversaries. In the heart of the Central African desert, Rogue learns the identity of Gambit’s parents and the truth about his origin.

At the same time, Sabretooth and Psylocke try to deal with the apparent loss of Mystiq while preparing to embark on a search and rescue mission to recover Rogue, unaware that they’ve already been caught up in an enemy’s cunning and deadly web.

Instead of a rescue, this new team of Exiles may be heading straight for disaster.
name: The Panther's Vengeance!

description:
Overview

As the Zombie Priest descends further and further into madness, the ends to which he will go to thwart the Goon know no bounds! Summoning powers which are beyond even his own comprehension, the Priest unleashes an unholy abomination on the unsuspecting denizens of their humble berg. But will this nightmarish fiend be too much for even the Priest to control?

Find out as Eric Powell's Eisner Award-winning series begins a new chapter in the ongoing chronicles of a man named Goon and his unshakeable sidekick Franky!

Overview

It's back to the present for Booster Gold! But history has changed, and not for the better. The new man in charge is Maxwell Lord, and his army of O.M.A.C.s won't stop until Booster is dead.

Plus, the return of Supernova!

In the time stream, Rip Hunter is in his sphere with Daneil Carter, Rose Levin and Skeets. History is changing thanks to Booster Gold having saved Ted Kord from Maxwell Lord. A time storm is coming and Rip gives Daniel a new Supernova costume.

In the present, Booster and Ted are being chased by OMACs. Booster is surprised because he thought they had all been stopped. History has been changed. Ted calls up one of his spare bugs to fly them out of there. Because Max had used some of Kord Industry tech, Ted is able to reprogram the OMACs into thinking they're just another OMAC flying around.

At the Chessmate headquarters in the Swiss Alps, Max receives an update on the deceased heroes, including Dr. Mid-Nite, Black Lightning, Lightning, Thunder, Nightwing, Cyborg, Black Canary, Hawkgirl and most recently Kyle Rayner (with his ring now in their possession). He then gets word that Booster and Blue Beetle are still alive. He wants them found.

Ted and Booster discover that every major city is being watched over by OMACs. Max is in complete power. Ted picks up a distress signal from England coming from the old Justice League International headquarters. They sneak inside through a tunnel Aquaman had installed. Inside they find Catherine Cobert, their old liaison.

Catherine fills them in on what has happened when the OMACs began hunting down the heroes. Brother EYE took out the JLA watchtower and several heroes are either dead or missing. It seems that Batman is gone and Superman has become Max's secret weapon. Max is controlling him with his mind powers. Catherine tells them that there's been rumors of a resistance growing which is why she activated the old distress signal.

Ted tells Booster that they need to get to Rip's time sphere and fix things. When Catherine overhears this, she transforms into an OMAC and attacks them. It's a trap! Booster tries contacting Skeets to send them some help as they are now targeted for elimination. As they begin fighting the OMAC, things appear really bad by the two heroes that arrive to help them. Green Arrow and Hawkman are working side by side.

250 million years ago, the Black Beetle shows up and takes Booster's dad (in the old Supernova suit) to the Vanishing Point. A meeting of the Time Stealers is now in session.
name: Blue & Gold, Chapter 2: O.M.A.C.'d

description: A guide to the Legion of Super-Heroes.
name: Legionnaires Three

volume.name: Legion of Super-Heroes Secret Files And Origins

description:
Overview

The jaw-dropping ending to "The Curse of the Alpha-Lantern"! Last issue, the Alpha-Lantern Boodikka uncovered secrets from her past that she believed long buried. Now she wishes they were, as her fight for survival continues!

Will the Green Lantern of sector 1414 come to her aide? The look into the life of Alpha-Lantern Boodikka concludes in part two of "The Curse of the Alpha-Lantern"!
name: The Curse of the Alpha Lantern Part 2

description:
Cover: Mike McMahon (Judge Dredd)

  • Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Verdus (part 8) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson)
  • Dan Dare - The Doomsday Machine (part 5) (Nick Landau and Roy Preston - Trevor Goring and Garry Leach)
  • Judge Dredd - The Cursed Earth (part 23) (Pat Mills - Mike McMahon)
  • Ant Wars (part 13) (Gerry Finley-Day - Azpiri)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - The Mote in God's Eye (Roy Preston - Puchades and Martinez)
  • 2000AD Star Pin-Up - Tweak (art: Brian Bolland)
name: Prog 83

description:
Death of Spikes Harvey Rotten this prog. Also, Robo-Hunter ends abruptly mid-series, before continuing in prog 100.

Cover: Kevin O'Neill (Ant Wars)

  • Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Verdus (part 9) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson)
  • Cursed Earth Supplement: Judge Dredd - The Last Meal (half page comic strip printed as an apology for the Jolly Green Giant inspired character that appeared in progs 77 and 78) (script/art: unknown)
  • Dan Dare - The Doomsday Machine (part 6) (Nick Landau and Roy Preston - Dave Gibbons and Garry Leach)
  • Judge Dredd - The Cursed Earth (part 24) (Pat Mills - Mike McMahon)
  • Ant Wars (part 14) (Gerry Finley-Day - Azpiri)
  • Walter the Wobot: Fwiend of Dredd - Meet Mekquake (part 1) (Gary Rice - Brendan McCarthy)
name: Prog 84

description:
All the stories reach their conclusions this prog to make way for the merger of 2000AD and Starlord next prog. From the next issue, Starlord heroes Ro-busters and Strontium Dog join the regular line-up.

Cover: Mike McMahon (Judge Dredd)

  • Dan Dare - The Doomsday Machine (part 7 - final part) (Nick Landau and Roy Preston - Dave Gibbons)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - The Fourth Wall (Mike Cruden - John Cooper)
  • Judge Dredd - The Cursed Earth (part 25 - final part) (Pat Mills - Mike McMahon)
  • Ant Wars (part 15 - final part) (Gerry Finley-Day - Pena)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - Poacher (Barry Clements - Jesus Redondo)
  • Walter the Wobot: Fwiend of Dredd - Meet Mekquake (part 2 - final part) (Gary Rice - Brendan McCarthy)
name: Prog 85

description:
First merged issue of 2000AD and Starlord. Two strips from 2000AD (Judge Dredd and Flesh) and joined by the top stories from the cancelled Starlord (Ro-Busters and Strontium Dog).

Cover: Dave Gibbons (the stars of 2000AD and Starlord)

  • Judge Dredd - Crime and Punishment (John Wagner - Brian Bolland)
  • Ro-Busters - Death on the Orient Express! (part 1) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)
  • Flesh - book two (part 1) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli)
  • Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 1) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
name: Prog 86

description:
Cover: Massimo Belardinelli (Flesh - book two)

  • Judge Dredd - Outlaw (John Wagner - Brian Bolland and Dave Gibbons)
  • Ro-Busters - Death on the Orient Express! (part 2 - final part) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)
  • Flesh - book two (part 2) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli)
  • Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 2) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
name: Prog 87

description:
Cover: Kevin O'Neill (Ro-Busters)

  • Judge Dredd - Bring Me the Head of Judge Dredd (John Wagner - Brendan McCarthy - Brett Ewins)
  • Ro-Busters - Hammerstein's War Memoirs (part 1) (Pat Mills - Kevin O'Neill)
  • Flesh - book two (part 3) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli)
  • Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 3) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - Date with Destiny (Mike Cruden - Massimo Belardinelli)
name: Prog 88

description:
Cover: Mike McMahon (Judge Dredd)

  • Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 1) (John Wagner - Mike McMahon)
  • Ro-Busters - Hammerstein's War Memoirs (part 2) (Pat Mills - Mike Dorey)
  • Flesh - book two (part 4) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli)
  • 2000AD Futuregraph - Preying Mantis Command Module (art: unknown)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - Child's Play (Mike Cruden - Trevor Goring)
  • Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 4) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
  • 2000AD Futuregraph - Judge Dredd's Lawmaster (art: unknown)
name: Prog 89

description:
Cover: The stars of 2000AD

  • Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 2) (John Wagner - Mike McMahon)
  • Ro-Busters - Hammerstein's War Memoirs (part 3) (Pat Mills - Kevin O'Neill)
  • 2000AD Futuregraph - Preying Mantis (Rear Section)
  • Flesh - book two (part 5) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli)
  • Tharg's Future Shocks - Kid's Stuff (Barry Clements - Carlos Pino)
  • Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 5) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
  • 2000AD Futuregraph - Zander Hunter - Killer Submarine (art: Bill Le-Fevre)
name: Prog 90

volume.name: Legion of Super-Heroes Secret Files And Origins

description: Slingshot's father is kidnapped and it's up to Dynamo 5 to save him. Unfortunately, Widowmaker and her crew take opportunity of that moment to invade the Aquarium to lay a trap for Dynamo 5 when they return.
As the final crisis draws near the heroes on Apokolips are faces with new revelations and and a choose at could save the multi-verse or destroy it. Plus the secret origin of Bizarro.
name: War In Pieces

description:
An infatuated Chastity investigate the origins of Evil Ernie in hopes of understanding him better. She visits his childhood home and is set upon by dead-onez. They start to overwhelm her in the close quarters until Ernie arrives and rips them apart. He is still distracted and hurting over Lady Death and won't admit to having followed Chastity since he rejected her at his bunker. He is not even that interested that his dead-onez failed to act on his commands.                                                                                                  
 
A smitten Chastity hooks up with Ernie as they go in search of death and destruction. 
 
In Lousianna the remains of the US forces are concerned. The arcane energy release has created a wave of supernatural creatures all over the country and knocked out satellites. The rest of the world is blaming the US for the psycho-plague and the energy burst known as the Pandora Effect. There a moves afoot for the rest of the world to take action against the US if things don't improve anytime soon. 
 
In Pennsylvania Dr Price is drinking himself into oblivion and disgusted by what he considers to be his failure. 
 
Autopsy, the twisted doctor, makes his first appearance.
name: Born To Be Wild

description:
Overview

The first Lone Ranger one-shot special from Dynamite and writer Brett Matthews - joined here by co-writer Jon Abrams! All under a Cassaday cover AND featuring artist Mario Guevara!

In this special Lone Ranger and Tonto adventure, something dark and murderous is moving through the frontier, and it's up to The Lone Ranger and Tonto to put a stop to it. But once they find it, will they be able to face it?

This 32 page one-shot is a great jumping on point for new fans/readers as well as an excellent companion issue to Dynamite's Eisner-Award Nominated Series!
name: Blood Relations

description:
Brief Overview


Chastity is in the streets of New York City, dressed up as a nurse so that she can get into the hospital and feed her hunger without murdering anyone. So she sneaks into a room filled with bags of blood, but just as she's about to sink her teeth into it a man, or vampire, grabs her from behind, attacking her but she manages to escape and drinks the blood while walking the streets. She returns to her boyfriend and talks with him a bit, about how their relationship will have to end and then leaves, now dressing up as a police officer. She enters a crime scene and takes the blood samples but is attacked by the vampire man again, once again managing to escape. Now in the streets however she is stopped by The Wanderer, after that short encounter she starts becoming depressed as she is forced to face the truth of what she is. Finally, the story comes to an end when she fights with the vampire once again, Blackstone, and with a little help from her boyfriend and The Wanderer, manages to defeat him. Her boyfriend than learns her secret and although they break up, they both promise to never forget one another, still remaining in love.
name: Love Bites

description:
Reprinting Avengers #30.

Goliath is searching for a cure to give him back his growing/shrinking powers so that he can revert back to normal size. He reads of his old professor doing research in South Africa on Body Cells, and believes he can cure him! Unfortunately, Dr. Anton has been kidnapped by a group of fanatics, the followers of the Eternal Flame!

Meanwhile, Hawkeye battles Power-Man, The Swordsman and the Black Widow!
name: Frenzy in a Far-Off Land!

description:
Reprinting Avengers #44

The Avengers invade the futuristic city of General Brushov and Colonel Ling to rescue Hawkeye and Black Widow. The past of Natasha and the Red Guardian is finally revealed, and Black Widow joins the side of the angels!
name: The Valiant Also Die!

description:
Reprinting Avengers #50

The Avengers team up with Hercules to reclaim Olympus!
name: To Tame A Titan!

description: Reprinting Avengers # 51
name: In The Clutches Of The Collector!

description:
Reprinting Avengers #47.

Magneto and the Toad have been freed form their Island prison by an unwitting Dane Whitman and his experimental Magnetic Enhancing invention. Once they have escaped, they set about reuniting the core of the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants, and use the new magnetic instrument to lure Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch to the fortress, where they are quickly subdued!

Meanwhile , Captain America has decided to leaves the ranks of the Avengers so he can concentrate on being Steve Rogers, Hawkeye and Natasha quarrel, and Hercules has returned home to find Olympus completely deserted!
name: Magneto Walks The Earth!

description:
Reprinting Avengers #54

Jarvis sells the security system plans to the New Masters of Evil. It seems his mother needs an expensive operation, and he figures that since the Avengers will defeat the New Masters of Evil anyway, there will be no harm in the transaction. What he cannot expect is that the villains will succeed, and end up defeating and capturing all the Avengers one at a time!

Chained up, the captive Avengers realize that their security secrecy has been breached, and wonder who sold them out..imagine their surprise when the leader of the Masters of Evil unmasks himself and reveals he is none other than..Jarvis!!!
name: ...And Deliver Us From The Masters of Evil!

description:
Reprinting Avengers #53

Hawkeye, Goliath, Wasp and the Black Panther have come upon X-Man Cyclops standing over the fallen figure of Quicksilver. Not sure of the situation, they tell the youth to freeze. Cyclops, however, suspects they’re only robots created by Magneto, and isn’t taking any chances. He fires at Hawkeye, and when Black Panther jumps down to subdue him, a couple of blasts from his optic visor give Cyclops enough time to get away!

It seems that when the Angel escaped Magneto’s prison back in X-Men #45, he went directly to the Avengers mansion for assisstance in rescuing his fellow X-Men. Since Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch were last seem leaving with Magneto back in Avengers #49, the Avengers are happy to team up tackling the master of Magnetism.

On the altantic flight over to Magneto’s island, Janet discovers a miniature bugging device hidden among Angel’s wings. The Avengers now believe he’s in cahoots with Magneto, and is setting them up. While he swears he ‘s innocent, they tie him up and leave him behind when they investigate the fortress. Thus we return to our opening scene where the Avengers have just arrived to see Cyclops flee!

Magneto is watching the entire drama play out, delighted that his plans are coming to fruition. Of course, it was all part of his plans for Angel to escape and get caught with the monitor on his wings. “ Now they and the X-Men , who might otherwise been allies- will be at each other’s throats!”

Toad doesn’t like the idea of bringing in the Avengers…they should have been satisfied capturing the X-Men- their REAL enemies! Magneto electrocutes Toad for his doubt, and Toad questions why Magneto always abuses him when he alone out of ALL the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants has been loyal. “Because I don’t NEED your Loyalty!” snaps Magneto. He explains that he’s only kept Toad around because it amused him, and now Toad is just angering him. Wanda steps in and begs Magneto to leave Toad alone, and Toad says “One day soon, Magneto shall know who his true friends are.”

Meanwhile, The Avengers have become antsy sneaking aruound the hidden fortress, and as usual, Hawkeye and Goliath start to bicker and fight. Soon the Black Panther, who initially tries to STOP the fight, is involved, and it is up to Jan to step in and remind them that there is a task at hand.

This moment of discourse is just what Magneto has been hoping to hear, and he releases a machine that unleashes crackling electronic commands upon the unsuspecting X-Men. When the sensations vanish, we realize just what the machine has done to their minds when Cyclops states, “There was something we were going to do! Yes- We were going to find the Avengers…and DESTROY THEM!”

Any doubt that the X-Men are on the wrong side of the good guys is gone when the Avnegers confront the angry teen mob and Cyclops orders: “Kill Them! Kill The Avengers!”

Beast stirkes the first blow at Black Panther, and the others follow his lead. After fighting for a while, the Avengers they find they are having a hard time beating them. Then Black Panther realizes it is because they subconsciously think of the X-Men as heroes, not villains. With this change in attitude, the Avengers make quick work of the youths, much to the confusion of Magneto, who thought the X-Men would be the victors!

His confusion only increases when he turns and finds The Angel has infiltrated the control room! Soon, the Avengers smash in, as well! Goliath knows Magneto must be dying of curiosity to find out what went wrong with his plans, and elucidates. “We guessed the bug on Angel was a plant, and tied his hands loosely! Wasp whispered in his ear our plans, then pretended to quarrel to lure you into an ill-timed attack!”

Magneto knows the only option is escape, and brings down a wall of metal parts onto the Avengers, giving himself enough time to get away! He orders Toad to get the escape ship, hitting him to get a move on. “He orders me to save him - and strikes me as he does so! Thus has he EVER rewarded my unwavering Loyalty!” thinks the Toad.

With a quick move, the Toad sets the machine generators to overload- soon the entire island will be decimated by the huge explosion! He leads the Scarlet Witch and a still dazed Quicksilver to a waiting escape ship. As the ship takes off, Magneto reaches out with his magnetic powers to lift him to the jet, but finds that his powers have no effect! Toad reminds him that he once bulit an entire ship out of non-metals, just to prove he could do it. As Magneto tries to hold onto the ship, He says, “Toad…Stop!! I am Your Master!” to which the Toad solemnly replies, “No Magneto. The Toad calls no man master- ever again!!” He steps on Magneto’s fingers and sends him hurtling to the jagged rocks below!

Meanwhile the Avengers and X-Men (who seem to have recovered from the hypno-ray) have made it back to their ship in time to witness the Toad and his crew leaving. They quickly shove off themslves, and a few minutes later, the very horizon rocks as the entire island goes up in a fiery explosion! Soon, the ocean is littered with smoking debris and machinery from the fortress, and among the bits of twisted metal floats the remains of Magneto’s once mighty metal helmet!

Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Iron Man in An Irresistible Force!
name: In Battle Joined!

description: Story has been moved to 1854 on a ship from Dublin to Boston where Purity is changed into vampire. She can't be sensed by other vampires and her master wants her help to kill Dracula.

name: Die Laughing

description: It's Halloween in New York, 1982. Sweet talkin' ladies man Slade lost his life - and his world - in a gangland hit that stole his niece's young life as well. On the anniversary of his death, Slade returns from the dead to exact revenge. Can Chastity Marks, the lovable vampire assassin save her dear friend Slade from a head on collison with a life of crime? Or is it too late already? Regardless, she's gonna have to go undercover to get the job done. It1s a pop cultural melting pot as the goth scene meets blaxploitation with a dash of hip hop thrown in for good measure, all with a supernatural twist. Recommended for fans of cute vampire goth chicks.

name: Hocus Pocus
The Passenger

description:
Trapped between the warring tribes led by The Joker and Lex Luthor, Catwoman is forced to make a deadly decision that will change several lives forever. The hostilities on Hell Planet are about to reach a boiling point, and nobody is a sure bet to make it out alive. And that's before things get worse with the unexpected arrival of a new group looking to exterminate every villain in sight.

Joker and his band of misfits tries a sneak raid on Luther for supplies. After a long battle it is revealed that Blockbuster is actually Martian Manhunter. Both sides team up and take him out...meanwhile it is finally shown that 'Master Desaad' is behind the planets origin. It is a testing ground for his Parademons, which now will be tested against Earth's worst criminals.
name: Through a Glass Deadly
Search and Destroy

description: In the underbelly of the Hell Planet from SALVATION RUN, Catwoman will have to fight through her turbulent past, her nightmarish present and a doom-filled future. The only person who can save her is the last person she'd expect to see this far from home: the Batman!
name: Waking Up On The Wrong Side Of The Universe, Part 2
Winners and Losers

description:
In Georgia Judy Young has hooked up with Samgunhill and is surviving in the mountains in a small town. They return one day to find it laid waste and on fire. Only Ginne survived and tell them that it was human soldiers from the Ameriacan restoration Alliance that did it.  
 
The ARA are based in Arizona and lead by Cyrus and have a political and scored earth agenda. the towns folk shot down a stealth helicopter and so they laid waste the town. They were looking for a nuclear stockpile rumored to be stashed somewhere in Georgia as well as biological weapons. the elader of the virus recovery mission is on Autopsy's operating table. He escapes but is killed and Autopsy names him G.I. Joseph. 
 
Mary and Billy are travelling in Georgia and hear news that Judy has been seen alive and well and is a legend in these parts for her zombie slaying ability.
  
Dr Price still wracked with remorse is contemplating suicide. 

Chastity and Ernie are on a mission to find some nuke's so they can do some real damage and escalate the war. As they drive Chastity needs to feed so they take a detour and come across a travelling circus and the two have fun killing the freaks and performers. Afterwards Ernie uses his mental connection to the dead to find one with knowledge of nuclear sites. Ernie connects with G.I. Joseph and finds he has the knowledge he needs.
name: Everyone Comes To The Freak Show

description:
A s Dr Price's insanity deepens he tries to hang himself but when the rope breaks he has a revelation. He can't die until he's fixed what he created. 
 
Chastity spies an amusement park as they drive and asks if they can go there for some more mayhem. Ernie claims to have never been to one but in his mind he remembers how his dad hit hit for asking to ride the ghost train and popped the balloon a nice lady gave him. Ernie and his new freak-show dead-onez wreak-up the rides and create a new personal army for Ernie's latest mission. 
 
As Ernie comes for the dead-one with the warhead information he requires Autopsy can sense him and knows he is trouble. The ARA bomb the building and Autopsy thinks its Ernie coming for G.I. Joe and so he knocks Joe out so Ernie cant track him.

At the ARA Janelle Armstrong, who was being electrocuted in an electric chair at the time of the Pandora effect, is in a huge machine being studied for what the arcane energy did to her.
name: Psycho Candy

description: Don't miss the latest chapter of "Hush," featuring the debut of a brand-new Batmobile! In the aftermath of last issue's stunning climax, Nightwing comes to Batman to find out how - or if - the Dark Knight can continue. Choices are made that will affect the entire Batman family, and there's no turning back! Plus, the shocking return of the last person you'd expect!
name: Hush Chapter Eight : The Dead

description:
Sam gets his arm broken by Ernie's car as it drive past. Chastity offers to stop but Ernie says they should drive on as the mission is more important. She is somewhat worried by Ernie's seriousness about firing the nukes, she loves him but up till now its been fun and now he wants to destroy everything.
 
The Young's battle the dead-onez they come across until Billy takes a bullet to the shoulder. They have a decision to make, save Billy or stop Ernie who now has all the information he needs to launch the nukes. They drive Billy to a camp and find a doctor able to help but he is drunk and needs Mary to help with the procedure. 
 
Judy and Sam track down Ernie and find him at the launch controls of the nukes. Sam tackles Ernie as Chastity grabs Judy. Chastity whispers to Judy to play along and shot her if she wants to live. Chastity takes machine gunfire to the chest and stumbles against the console pressing the abort button but the console is wrecked. 
 
The couple leave as the nukes launch leaving a stunned Judy on the launch rooms floor.
name: Atomic Punk

description:
Ernie tears up Atlanta in the hopes of finding the one dead-one he knows has the nuclear weapon information he needs to escalate his war. 
 
Judy and Sam capture a dead-one and run a current through its brain which sometimes gets them to talk. In this case it works and the dead-one reveal that Ernie is in Atlanta and headed for the medical building where Autopsy lives.  
 
The ARA watches as Ernie attacks the medical center himself and kills what remains of their troops at the location. General Ramsey is taken to the ARA where he is to be executed and sees Janelle being held captive and experimented on. She was his girlfriend but refused his proposal of marriage as she couldn't be married to the army forever.
 
Ernie and Autopsy clash and find they are a match for each other until Ernie grabs a gun and fires hard into Autopsy's chest. Autopsy rises and realizes he knows Ernie''s weakness.. his childhood.. and their energies clash. As the two start a mental battle Autopsy floods Ernie's mind with a nightmarish vision of his parents that overwhelms him.
 
Homicide and the crazy babies spy Mary and Billy but he refuses to take a killing sniper shot on Billy as being too impersonal.
name: Overkill

description:
Ernie battles the mental demons in his head that Autopsy has projected there. Ernie wakes to find himself on Autopsy's operating table as he is questioned about how he controls the dead by the curious doctor.
 
Janelle teleports the imprisoned Ramsey out of the base into the Arizona Desert to give him a chance of escape.                                                                                                                                      
 
Price saws off his own gangrenous arm in the church.  
  
Chastity is searching for Ernie and manages to sense their location. She storms in fatally injuring Fakir who was carrying a chainsaw as she bursts in. She tears off Autopsy's mask and finds his face eaten away and rotting. Earnie bursts out of his restrains and cuts the doctor in two with the chainsaw.

Mary and Billy get closer to Judy and eventually catch up with her for a big reunion. Which is short lived as Ernie and Chastity drive out of the hospital and right into their path.
name: Welcome To My Nightmare

description:
When Principal Skinner gets wind of a surprise inspection, he is not prepared to pay the price for Bart's "best behavior." Then Bart gives advice to kids on how to avoid going to school, and gets a lesson in the age-old question of old age. Throw in Bart's part-time job at the Kwik-E-Mart, a near miss with a flu shot, a suspicious special delivery, and you've got a jam-packed issue of Bart Simpsony-goodness. Start your day with Bart this April!

1. Bart vs. the One-Man School (written by Tom Peyer)

The school is getting a surprise inspection. How good will Bart be?

2. The Sick Day (written by Tom Peyer)

Bart gives school skipping lessons.

3. Special Delivery (written by James Bates)

What's in that package?

4. Kwik-E-Bart (written by Tom Peyer)

Bart gets a job at the Kwik-E-Mart. Eat my shorts and come again!

5. Grampa Bart (written by Tom Peyer)

Bart learns about old-agedom

6. Flu Shot (written by James Bates)

How will Marge get Bart and Lisa to take their flu shots?
name: Best in the West

description:
With the successful launch of 12 warheads Chastity and Ernie go and have so well earned down time. Chastity tries to educated Ernie on music but he is more interested in how his missiles are doing and wants the radio news on. It seems Chastity's last minute gambit prevented the launch of 2 of the missiles. but the ones headed for Detroit, Beijing, Moscow, Paris, Johannesburg and Baghdad are on target. The respective countries detect the launches and prepare defenses and responses.
 
Chastity gives Ernie a quick makeover giving him the appearance of gene Simmons and tries to seduce him to distract him from the radio. She kisses him but he rejects her yet again. She walks away heartbroken as Smiley mourns Ernie's dedication to Lady Death.
  
Mary operates on Billy but its proving difficult with her unskilled hands and Billy dies on the operating table. Dr Price is blinded by an atomic blast and lies drunk on the ground.
name: Set The World Afire

description:
Detroit is in ruins and covered n radioactive fall out.  
 
Countries around the world launch counter measures in the hope of taking out the incoming nukes before the hit their targets. The ones headed for Europe, Russian and Asia are successfully taken out but the rest remain on course.  
 
In the States the ARA starts a campaign to take take down Ernie. He faces 200 highly trained soldiers killing each one in turn. As he finishes the last one 8 cybernetically enhanced soldiers arrive and blast Ernie with arcane energy like weapons. He is reduced to a few green motes of ash and Smiley button in a smoldering crater.
 
Smiley gets a word in edgewise to Ernie for a change and points out that while he loves Lady death she cant be with Ernie for a very long time and until then why not spend that time with Chastity... after all Ernie yearnd love and Chastity wanted to give it.
name: Motor City is Burning

description:
The blast of Ernie's destruction killed the soldiers who vaporised him and Smiley remains unconscious at the bottom of the crater. Janelle visits smiley in the crater and revives him. She is angry that her power was used here to kill and wants to redress the balance. Slowly the green glow of arcane energy ripples through the earth, it grows and forms, splitting and branching as things form into bone like shapes. Slowly a body rises and binds and forms into a shape thats not unlike Evil Ernie.                                                    
 
 Chastity is trying to sense Evil but can't find him even after his body starts to reform. As Ernie starts to walk he finds dead-onez won't respond to him anymore but Chastity catches up with him and they kiss. As he prepares to leave the remaining cybernetic soldiers appear and saying they are under his control.
 
At NORAD confirms that the remaining 3 missiles hit their targets. 
  
Homicide visits the corpse of Billy and laments he wasn't able to kill him and bring him into un-life himself but he does have a use for him. Homicide touches his lips and leaves. Mary wants to see Billy and when they find him he appears to be alive.
name: Tyranny and Mutation

description:
Cerebus is still dreaming and different people make dream appearances. Cerebus wakes up and Lord Storms'end is sitting on his bed!

Also includes "Gam Jam I or 'Just Another Night in Charlotte,'" which was a convention event, and a Photo of Dave at the 1985 Dallas Fantasy Fair.
name: Odd Transformations Part Two

description:
Yosemite Sam has become a charming man-about-town! What's his terrible scheme? Plus, Sam Sheepdog and Ralph just want to get away from it all, but it seems they're destined for a working vacation.   

  

1. My Fair Sammy (Yosemite Sam) 
 
2. Last Resort (Wile E. Coyote, Barnyard Dawg) 
 
3. Hitting His Mark (Bugs Bunny, Elmer Fudd)
name: My Fair Sammy

description:
1. Bugs Bunny - (Shopping List) - 1 page - feat. Petunia Pig(untitled) (inside front cover)

  2. Bugs Bunny - Dig That Demon - 15 pages - feat. Elmer Fudd

  3. Bugs Bunny - The Champion Chump - 10 pages - Daffy Duck, Horton Hound

  4. Bugs Bunny - (Odd Job Company) - 1 page - feat. Elmer Fudd (untitled)

  5. Bugs Bunny - (Slugsy Bugsy Boxing Lessons) - 1 page - feat. Elmer Fudd (untitled)

  6. Bugs Bunny - The "Isle of Hercules" - 36 pages - feat. Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig, Petunia Pig, Cicero Pig

  7. Bugs Bunny - The Smoke Smeller - 10 pages

  8. Bugs Bunny - Lighthouse Keeper Capers - 7 pages - feat. Elmer Fudd

  9. Elmer Fudd - (Bugs Bunny motorcycle cop) - 1 page (untitled) (inside back cover)

  10. Bugs Bunny - (Row Boat Fishing) - 1 page Pin-Up - feat. Porky Pig, Elmer Fudd, Petunia Pig, Cicero Pig (untitled)

1. Cover by Bob Oksner.
  2. "The Lady is a Bomb!" (part 1) "The Riddle of Doom!" (part 2) "Who Steals my Name..." (part 3) written by Arnold Drake, penciled by John Rosenberger and inked by Vince Colletta. (Lois Lane, Superman, Perry White) A young man, who says Superman betrayed him, holds Lois hostage with a super explosive.
name: The Lady is a Bomb!

description: Everyone has their own disturbing versions of what hell is, but Joe Dante and his team soon discover that nothing in their worst nightmares could have prepared them for what they're about to face. Hell isn't what they expected but unfortunately, that isn't a good thing.

Still reeling from her horrifying vision of the walking undead, Shan Beaumont sees herself in the future: Driven mad, just like her father. But she must find the truth. She and a friend Winston visit a modern-day Egyptian cult to find out what Victor Hahn is planning. To stop her, he sends an army of mummified dead but Cleopatra wards off the fiends, and offers to help Shan learn about the Osiris Amulet...and the truth about her past.

The final battle between Victor Hahn and Shan Beaumont rages and the world's fate hangs in the balance. In the end, there is only one way to stop Victor from opening the gateway and taking over the world, and that is through the sacrifice of Shan's own heart. What will Osiris do when his Chosen is led to the slaughter?

1. The Colossal Kids (Superman, Batman and Robin / all parts written by Edmond Hamilton)

Can Batman and Superman discover the secret of Force Boy and Speed Kid, two super brats?

  1. Nature's Bill of Rights (public service message by Jack Schiff)

  2. The Colossal Kids Part II- The Magic of Bat-Mite and Mr. Mxyzptlk

The secret identities of Force Boy and Speed Kid are revealed. Who could they be?

  1. Weapons of Destiny (a selection from "The Editors' Round Table" / written by Otto Binder : reprinted from: Tales of the Unexpected #13)

  2. Super-Turtle (gag strip by Henry Boltinoff)
name: The Colossal Kids

description:
1. The Mystery of Mighty Boy! Part 1 (Superboy, Krypto, Mighty Boy, Rovo, Ma and Pa Kent, Superboy robots / all parts written by Otto Binder : reprinted in: Superman Annual #6)

  2. Children of Tomorrow! (public service message written by Jack Schiff)

  3. The Mystery of Mighty Boy! Part 2: Superboy's Lost Friend! (Superboy)

  4. Homer (gag strip by Henry Boltinoff)

  5. The Impossible Mission! (Superboy, Lex Luthor / written by Jerry Siegel : reprinted in: 80 Page Giant #11)

  6. Bebe (gag strip by Henry Boltinoff)
name: The Mystery of Mighty Boy!

description: Bat Lash is on a desperate chase to beat Brubaker and his boys back to his fathers ranch. Along the way Wilder intercepts him and believes he has killed Bat Lash. Meanwhile, Bat Lash's family is gunned down and the ranch set ablaze. Wilder's daughter is disgusted at her fathers actions and plans on leaving. His family dead, Bat Lash sets out to get his revenge against each and every last man involved.
name: Guns And Roses, Chapter 4 - Blood Oath

description: Simon remembers where he was born, or should I say created. He goes back to where science and black magic came together to breathe life into him and discovers a book that was left behind by his 'parents'. Meanwhile, Beth and Rachel go to the humane society and get Simon a new cat to replace the one that was slaughtered. All the while, the hinting of a evil plot starts to unfold with the introduction of altered Mendo soap that finds its way into households throughout Gotham..
name: Simple Simon

description:
Historic 100th issue of 2000AD. After being left hanging after part nine (prog 84), Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter is back for the concluding run of his first story - Verdus. Dan Dare returns, picking up from the cliff-hanger at the end of prog 85 (written by Tom Tully, who would go on to write DD in the relaunched Eagle). Also this prog, the start of a four-part collectable Judge Dredd poster in the colour centre-spread.

Cover: Ian Gibson (Robo-Hunter)

  • Ro-Busters - The Terra-Meks! (part 3) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)

  • Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Verdus (part 10) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson)

name: Prog 110

description:
Flashback shows how the Suicide Squad broke into Arkham Asylum and beat down the Shark. Shark overhears the Squad talking about the prison planet and relays the info to Matches Malone, a.k.a. Batman. Penguin gets his group of wannabe costumed super villains and attacks the Whale and his armies. Batman escapes the prison with the help of Alfred and Nightwing is gunned down by the Vigilante....

Great White Shark retells the story of how he ended up in the prison's hospital: he was in the Arkham Asylum when someone else gave him his dinner for the night. Other villains broke through the wall, and Bane ended up smashing his face in and throwing him out the window, down to the ground floor, near the entrance of the Asylum. Bane wasn't supposed to kill him though; he was supposed to rough him up. Back to present day, Matches Malone is finding a way to block the door from the prison guards when a wall explodes, a gas grenade flies in, and Matches escapes...

At Whale's compound, Whale rallies the troops and says that Penguin is a dead man. Meanwhile, Spoiler is looking in through a window high up...

At the Iceberg Lounge, Penguin rallies his own troops. He finishes his speech and tells them that Gotham will soon know them all as the most dangerous criminals. He is then given the phone from one of his henchmen, and talks into the phone, assuming that everything went well. Spoiler on the other end tells him that everything went as according to plan. Penguin then tells her her next mission: to assassinate Johnny Stitches.

Back at the prison, a grapple flies through, and Matches uses the the rope from the grapple to slide down to the ground floor, and meets Alfred in the Batmobile.

At Whale's compound, the war begins. Dinardo (Nightwing) calls the Batsquad and tells them to be prepared, as it's all about to happen now. Wildcat and Robin, on their bikes race to the scene. Vigilante then shoots Dinardo, when Dinardo's team mates shoot the gun out of his hand. All three of them shoot down Vigilante, but they leave Dinardo. He then sees a vision of Leslie Thompkins of her saying that she will help him...
name: Gotham Underground Book Six: Breaking Out

Cover: Ron Smith (Judge Dredd)

name: Prog 120

description:
Overview

The Countdown ticks down as storylines converge and collide — a Great Disaster is clearly proving to be unavoidable!

Why is the Justice League so unfriendly with the Challengers?

Plus The Origin of Bane by Scott Beatty and Graham Nolan.

Holly and Harley make their way back to Gotham now that they are back on Earth. It seems that the powers they were given by the gods are gone. The Challengers take Karate Kid's body to the Hall of Justice to see if they can cure or contain the virus in him. Ray tries entering but it seems the access code has been changed. Superman appears and informs them that they've never changed the code. He demands to know who they are and what they want. Superman doesn't recognize any of them. Flash and Hal arrive too after hearing the alarm. Firestorm suddenly arrives and teleports them out of there.

In upstate New York, Firestorm tells them that he tried going home but found out he doesn't exist there. They've all been erased somehow. As they try to figure out what they're going to do next, Una begins yelling that they need to do something to save Karate Kid. They soon remember that Cadmus has a secret facility near their location.

When they arrive, they find Jimmy and his friends. They also discovered that things were different and figured they'd all meet up here. Kyle retrieves Holly and Harley. Harley is in tears after trying to visit the Joker in Arkham, he didn't recognize her. Jason was too busy fighting some street thug so Kyle left him.

When they enter Cadmus, they are soon attacked by some multi-armed creatures. After they are taken out, Dubbilex appears. Jimmy is happy to see him. Dibbilex has no idea who he is but can read that Jimmy has known him for a long time. They soon tell him about Karate Kid and that he has the Moricoccus virus. He also senses that Ray has the curative serum within him. Una asks if he can save him. He says he would but Karate Kid is already dead...
name: Gone Tomorrow

description:
Bart is forced to join the Springfield Elementary cheerleading squad, but will he use his talents to build the spirit squad,or bring shame to his school? Then, Nelson explains the world of adult nerds, Sherri & Terri do the twin thing to Principal Skinner, and Maggie and Moe join to together to solve a crime.

1. Bart's Got Spirit! (written by James Bates)

Bart is forced into becoming a male cheerleader. Will he tell the school to E-A-T M-Y S-H-O-R-T-S?

2. Nelson Muntz's Guide to Grown-up Nerds (starring Nelson Muntz / written by Tony Digerolamo)

Adult nerds are explained via Nelson

3. The Kiss of Blecch! (starring Sherri & Terri / written by Digerolamo)

Bart loses a game of spin the bottle...

4. The Maggie & Moe Mysteries! In Color! (starring Maggie Simpson and Moe Szyslak / written by Tony Digerolamo)

Can this detective duo solve the case?
name: Cartoon Genius

description: "With those crazy Looney Tunes"
The adaptation of filmmakers Neil Gaiman, Roger Avary, and Robert Zemeckis' Beowulf continues here with Issue #3.
